Banner.Description: A passionate developer with 4 years of experience as an Android app and 2+ yesrs of experience as a Backend developer. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in NodeJS and ExpressJS and sometimes in Angular applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 6 plus years as a developer, I seek to train every day. Some of the technologies that I have worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend and Android Application Developer
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Developed Android applications using Java, XML, Node.js, and MongoDB
Designed and implemented Apollo GraphQL & RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using Node.js and Express.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Android Application Developer
Description: Developed and maintained android applications using Java, XML, SQLite and RESTFul API's.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An Android application which searches for missing child by reporting a missing child case to helpline. Allows users to upload an image of the missing child or report any unattended children.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An internet-based app that fetches data from JSON APIs on the runtime and display data according to the person logged-in & their roles assigned.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Etro Communication Tracker is an android app that Etro reps used for visiting investigators (doctors).

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This app provides Institute s Handbook for the Design & Specification of House assemblies, Institute White Papers, Marketing and Training resources and the full Glossary of Terms. The application itself is used by define set of experts with a complete admin panel and dashboard as a web solution.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
